import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/Chart" />

# Default Chart Factory

```jsx
const DefaultChartFactory = (props) => {
	const {Component = DefaultChartContainer, ...otherProps} = props;

	const ComposedComponent = R.compose(
		withChartConfigLoader,
		withCriteriaStateListener(props.id),
		withCriteriaState((s, x) => x)
	)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedComponent {...otherProps}/>
	);
};
```
